title: Abducted
description: Andrea Canning reports on the case that made national headlines in December 2019, when a Texas mother was found murdered after she and her newborn daughter disappeared. Originally aired on NBC on January 31, 2020.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
